channel.title: SNES, NES, etc. Games on Wii
channel.description:
Has anyone bought them besides me? I have bought:
[ul][li]Super Mario 3 - Incomplete[/li] [li]Donkey Kong Country: Complete[/li] [li]Donkey Kong County 2: Diddy Kong's Quest: Complete[/li] [li]Donkey Kong 3: Dixie Kong's Double Trouble: Incomplete(Just started this one, it's a lot different than the other two. Me and my sister have nothing better to do and have sat countless hours trying to beat the first two. Took me about 50 lives just for K. Rool on DKC2.[/li][/ul]
There are a lot of games available. It's around 6-10$ in Wii points per game, but in my opinion it is worth bring back these games. Discuss.

item.title: SNES, NES, etc. Games on Wii

item.description:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:1, topic:289060”]Has anyone bought them besides me? I have bought:

[ul][li]Super Mario 3 - Incomplete[/li]
[li]Donkey Kong Country: Complete[/li]
[li]Donkey Kong County 2: Diddy Kong’s Quest: Complete[/li]
[li]Donkey Kong 3: Dixie Kong’s Double Trouble: Incomplete(Just started this one, it’s a lot different than the other two. Me and my sister have nothing better to do and have sat countless hours trying to beat the first two. Took me about 50 lives just for K. Rool on DKC2.[/li][/ul]

There are a lot of games available. It’s around 6-10$ in Wii points per game, but in my opinion it is worth bring back these games. Discuss.[/quote]

get homebrew channel; Very easy to put emulators on and roms, and get vc for free. I have a vid on youtube. look up my name

item.title: SNES, NES, etc. Games on Wii
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:289060”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=382149.msg2870492#msg2870492 date=1247727554]
wii sucks, why would you waste your money on it?
[/quote]

I didn’t buy my Wii, it was a gift. Some games I don’t mind. My second oldest sister has stolen a PS1 and SNES from me. I just got a free PS1 though. I’d rather play the oldies than these new games. You don’t remember anything like Kroc?[/quote]Ps1 is the best, Crash bandicoot, spyro, man those were good games.

Read full topic
